pin-cushion.SETTINGS.AboutAppH: Displays additional info about Pin Cushion
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.ShowJournalPreviewH: Shows a Journal preview when hovering over a map pin
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.PreviewTypeH: The type of Journal preview to show (HTML or Text snippet)
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.PreviewMaxLengthH: **TEXT PREVIEW ONLY** How many characters should the text preview show?
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.PreviewDelayH: How long before preview appears (in milliseconds)
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.DefaultJournalPermissionH: The default permission journal entries will be created with
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.DefaultJournalFolderH: The default folder journal entries will be created in when creating Map Pins with a double-click
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.EnableBackgroundlessPinsH: If enabled this setting will let you with a additional checkbox 'Has Background ?' on the note configuration panel remove or not the background box from map notes. WARNING: If you disable this module setting you simply have all your notes with background (the standard way), but the flags on the notes are not delete, so you can re-enable this when you want. YOU NEED TO REFRESH THE PAGE FOR APPLY THE SETTING.
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.ShowJournalImageByDefaultN: Show by default the icon image of the journal on the map note.
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.ShowJournalImageByDefaultH: If a image is set on the journal by default is the first image set from Pin Cushion
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.PlayerIconAutoOverrideH: Newly created notes will have player-only icons enabled automatically.
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.PlayerIconPathDefaultH: The default icon used for player-only icons
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.noteGMH: Add the ability for Note tooltips to be configured so that GMs see different text to Players. So secret information can be displayed to GMs whilst players see the 'public' information about the Note.
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesN: Enable revealed state on scene Notes.
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesH: When enabled, then the 'revealed' state will be used to determine if the Note is visible to players. (The default Foundry VTT behavior is for Notes to be visible to players only if the linked document is accessible by the player.)
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesTintColorN: [Only if setting 'Enable revealed state on scene Notes.' is enabled] Set the tint color of the Note revealed state on scene Notes.
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesTintColorH: Is an option to set the tint color of the Note icon to indicate if the linked document is reachable or not (if the Note has no linked document, then it will always be displayed in the 'unreachable' tint).
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesTintColorLinkN: [Only if setting 'Enable revealed state on scene Notes.' is enabled] Linked Icon Tint
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesTintColorLinkH: For PLAYERs, the RGB value to be used to tint scene Notes if they have a reachable link (if left blank then the tint, if any, will remain unchanged).  For GMs, this is the initial Icon Tint set during import
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesTintColorNotLinkN: [Only if setting 'Enable revealed state on scene Notes.' is enabled] Not-linked Icon Tint
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesTintColorNotLinkH: For PLAYERs, the RGB value to be used to tint scene Notes if they do not have a reachable link (if left blank then the tint, if any, will remain unchanged).  For GMs, this is the initial Icon Tint set during import
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesTintColorRevealedN: [Only if setting 'Enable revealed state on scene Notes.' is enabled] Revealed Icon Tint
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesTintColorRevealedH: For GMs, the RGB value to be used to tint scene Notes if they have been revealed to players (if left blank then the tint, if any, will remain unchanged).  For GMs, this is the initial Icon Tint set during import
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.revealedNotesTintColorNotReveal: [Only if setting 'Enable revealed state on scene Notes.' is enabled] Not-revealed Icon Tint
For GMs, the RGB value to be used to tint scene Notes if they have not been revealed to players (if left blank then the tint, if any, will remain unchanged)
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.SpecificFolderH: Make sense only with the module setting 'Default Journal Entry Folder' set with value 'Specific folder'
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.enableJournalThumbnailForGMsN: Enable Sidebar Journal Images for GM Users
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.enableJournalThumbnailForPlayer: Enable Sidebar Journal Images for Player Users
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.journalThumbnailPositionN: [Only if setting 'Enable Sidebar Journal Images for GM Users' or 'Enable Sidebar Journal Images for Player Users' is enabled] Thumbnail Position
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.journalThumbnailPositionH: Whether the thumbnail is left of the journal entry title or right
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.fontSizeH: Override the base text size for the journal entry display. Example: 1.5rem.
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.maxWidthH: The maximum width the entry display can grow to before it'll force wrapping.
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.tooltipUseMousePositionForCoord: Use mouse position for show the tooltip
When you hover a note on the canvas the tooltip is build based on the current mouse position instead the journal icon position. This solution seem to be more dynamic.
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.forceToShowNotesH: Automatically flag journal notes to show on the map without having to have your players turn it on themselves.
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.reset.name: Reset settings to default
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.reset.label: Reset Settings To Default
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.debug.name: Enable debugging
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.debug.label: Prints debug messages to the console
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.dialogs.resetsettings.title: Reset Module Settings
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.dialogs.resetsettings.content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!
pin-cushion.SETTINGS.oneClickNoteCreationH: Create Notes directly on the Notes Layer with a simple left click without having a connected journal entry. NOTE: You need to reload the canvas.
pin-cushion.Tooltip.Placement.title: Tooltip Placement
pin-cushion.Tooltip.Color.title: Tooltip Color
pin-cushion.Tooltip.ForceRemove.title: Tooltip Force remove when not on hover. Note: do not use this if you need a interactive note.
pin-cushion.Tooltip.SmartPlacement.title: Tooltip activate 'Smartplacement' feature
pin-cushion.Tooltip.FollowMouse.title: Tooltip activate Follow Mouse feature
pin-cushion.Name: Name:
pin-cushion.CreateMissingFoldersC:
Create a Journal Entry folder for each player?
This ensures that each player has their own folder for entries to be created in.
pin-cushion.PlayerIconHint: Enable to override the icon players will see.
pin-cushion.AllowPlayerNotes: Players also need the Core Foundry Permission "{permission}" to create map pins.
pin-cushion.ShowImage: Show on the tooltip linked Image instead of text ?
pin-cushion.ShowImageExplicitSource: Select and show on the tooltip a explicit Image instead linked image
pin-cushion.PreviewAsTextSnippet: Show the preview as text snippet
